results.justification: The paper explicitly states its research methodology, focusing on developing and evaluating a dialogue knowledge tracing (dialogueKT) framework. (Section 1.1 Contributions)
The paper provides a step-by-step description of the study design, including data annotation, model training, and evaluation. (Sections 4, 5, and 6)
The paper mentions the use of CoMTA and MathDial datasets. (Section 5.1 Datasets)
While datasets are mentioned, direct links to access them are not provided within the text. The paper does mention that one dataset contains partial dialogues, implying potential access limitations.

A data dictionary or codebook explaining variables, formats, and preprocessing steps is not included in the paper. Table 1 provides some dataset statistics, but it's not a comprehensive documentation.
Data collection methods are described for both CoMTA and MathDial datasets. (Section 5.1 Datasets)
The paper explicitly states that the code is publicly available on GitHub: 'We publicly release our code1 https://github.com/umass-ml4ed/dialogue-kt' (Section 1.1 Contributions)
Code is shared, so this criterion is not applicable.
The paper states that the code includes data preparation steps, as it's a complete implementation of the described methods. (Section 1.1 Contributions)
Statistical tests, models (KT methods), and assumptions are clearly described. (Sections 4.2, 4.3, 5.2, and 6.1)
Effect sizes (accuracy, AUC, F1) and standard deviations are reported. (Table 2)
Subjective context and interpretation are given through case studies and error analysis. (Section 6.2 and 7.2)
While qualitative analysis is performed, the data coding and analysis process isn't explicitly described or shared in detail. The error analysis is descriptive but lacks a formal coding scheme.
Results are clearly presented in tables and through textual descriptions. (Section 6.1 and Table 2)
Limitations and potential biases are discussed throughout the paper, particularly in Section 1.1 Contributions and Section 6.1.
The paper does not contain a link to a preregistration.
